A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: (4.5/5). Despite what the butthurt fanboys will have you belive\, this is a great movie. It has great themes of leadership and letting the past die\, for the most part it has strong characters. The dynamic between Kylo and Rey is even stronger here in this film\, and I admired most of the things Rian Johnson did with the mythos of the force. The whole casino subplot sidetracks the film a bit\, and it makes the movie longer than it needs to be but the rest of the film makes up for it. It also features one of the best performances Mark Hamill has ever given. Looking forward to Ep. 9!
